Second UserStory: i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# through pure
First UserStory: i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# through a simple web interface

Text.Second UserStory: #g24# as a depositor, i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# through pure, so that i have a single onestop shop for managing my research outputs.
Text.First UserStory: #g24# as a depositor, i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# through a simple web interface, so that i don't need to install and learn new software to deposit.

Second UserStory: i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# through virtual research environments and other workflow tools
First UserStory: i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# through a simple web interface

Text.Second UserStory: #g24# as a depositor, i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# through virtual research environments and other workflow tools, so that i can continue to work with tools with which i'm familiar.
Text.First UserStory: #g24# as a depositor, i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# through a simple web interface, so that i don't need to install and learn new software to deposit.

Second UserStory: i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# via an api such as sword2
First UserStory: i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# through a simple web interface

Text.Second UserStory: #g24# as a developer, i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# via an api such as sword2, so that my service can interact with the archive.
Text.First UserStory: #g24# as a depositor, i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# through a simple web interface, so that i don't need to install and learn new software to deposit.

Second UserStory: i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# via an api such as sword2
First UserStory: i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# through virtual research environments and other workflow tools

Text.Second UserStory: #g24# as a developer, i want to #deposit# and #maintain# #datasets# via an api such as sword2, so that my service can interact with the archive.

Second UserStory: i want to #link# #datasets# with the project dmp
First UserStory: i want to #link# #datasets# to publications in opus

Text.Second UserStory: #g24# as a depositor, i want to #link# #datasets# with the project dmp, so that compliance with dmp can be demonstrated and whole project workflow is linked together.
Text.First UserStory: #g24# as a depositor, i want to #link# #datasets# to publications in opus, so that both my data and publications are more easily discovered.

Second UserStory: so that i can #demonstrate# the #impact# of my #work#
First UserStory: so that i can #demonstrate# the #impact# of my #work#.

Text.Second UserStory: #g24# as a depositor, i want to track citations of my data, so that i can #demonstrate# the #impact# of my #work#
Text.First UserStory: #g24# as a depositor, i want to track downloads of my data, so that i can #demonstrate# the #impact# of my #work#.

Second UserStory: i want to #have# #guarantees# that my ip rights will not be breached
First UserStory: i want to #have# #guarantees# about data integrity

Text.Second UserStory: #g24# as an externalcoordinator, i want to #have# #guarantees# that my ip rights will not be breached, so that the risk of collaborating with bath is acceptable to me.
Text.First UserStory: #g24# as a depositor, i want to #have# #guarantees# about data integrity, so that i can use my data in the future and i can fulfil funder requirements for archival.

Second UserStory: so that #whole project workflow# is #linked together#.
First UserStory: so that compliance with dmp can be demonstrated and #whole project workflow# is #linked together#.

Text.Second UserStory: #g24# as a depositor, i want to manage and share 'live' research data, so that #whole project workflow# is #linked together#.
Text.First UserStory: #g24# as a depositor, i want to link datasets with the project dmp, so that compliance with dmp can be demonstrated and #whole project workflow# is #linked together#.

Second UserStory: so that i can #get back# to the #data# in future.
First UserStory: so that i can #get back# to the #data# in future and i can import the dataset into my referencemanagement software automatically.

Text.Second UserStory: #g24# as a data reuser, i want to get a persistent url for a dataset, so that i can #get back# to the #data# in future.
Text.First UserStory: #g24# as a data reuser, i want to view a doi for a dataset, so that i can #get back# to the #data# in future and i can import the dataset into my referencemanagement software automatically.

First UserStory: so that #consistent quality# of #metadata# is #maintained#, compliance with policies can be checked and details of licensing can be checked.

Text.Second UserStory: #g24# as a bath data archive administrator, i want to require a minimum set of #metadata#, so that #consistent quality# of #metadata# is #maintained#.
Text.First UserStory: #g24# as a bath data archive administrator, i want to make some checks on deposited datasets before they are made public, so that #consistent quality# of #metadata# is #maintained#, compliance with policies can be checked and details of licensing can be checked.

Second UserStory: i want to #integrate# the #archive# with existing university systems such as ldap
First UserStory: i want to #integrate# the #archive# with cris

Text.Second UserStory: #g24# as an univitservice, i want to #integrate# the #archive# with existing university systems such as ldap, so that the cost of administering the system can be kept low.
Text.First UserStory: #g24# as a research information manager, i want to #integrate# the #archive# with cris, so that i can analyse impact of research data publication i can link funding to all of the outputs it produces.

Second UserStory: i want to segment the view and download statistics by country and sector so that #impact# of #datasets# outside academia can be #demonstrated#.
First UserStory: so that #impact# of #datasets# within academia can be #demonstrated#.

Text.Second UserStory: #g24# as a research information manager, i want to segment the view and download statistics by country and sector so that #impact# of #datasets# outside academia can be #demonstrated#.
Text.First UserStory: #g24# as a research information manager, i want to track citation counts for published #datasets#, so that #impact# of #datasets# within academia can be #demonstrated#.

Second UserStory: i want to #store# #archived data# directly on the hcp object store
First UserStory: i want to #store# #archived data# on existing storage systems

Text.Second UserStory: #g24# as an univitservice, i want to #store# #archived data# directly on the hcp object store, so that  features can be made.
Text.First UserStory: #g24# as an univitservice, i want to #store# #archived data# on existing storage systems, so that university data storage is consistent and maintainable and future availability of data can be guaranteed.
